Volunteer with Meow Rescue

Volunteers are the heart of Meow Rescue. Without our dedicated team of volunteers, we wouldn't be able to help as many cats as we do.

There are many ways to volunteer with Meow Rescue, from fostering cats to helping at adoption events.

Volunteer Opportunities

  • Fostering cats and kittens
  • Helping at adoption events
  • Transporting cats to vet appointments
  • Fundraising and grant writing
  • Social media and website management
  • Community outreach and education

Volunteer Requirements

To volunteer with Meow Rescue, you must:

  • Be at least 18 years old (or 16 with parent/guardian permission)
  • Complete a volunteer application
  • Attend a volunteer orientation
  • Commit to at least 4 hours per month
